alert.note: Alert for East Glacier Park Region; Elkhorn and Boulder Mountains; Northwest Beaverhead County; Southern Rocky Mountain Front; Upper Blackfoot and MacDonald Pass (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued October 21 at 5:22PM MDT until October 23 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 6 PM MDT SUNDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 inches at lower elevations and up to 15 inches at ridgetops. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph at ridgetops. * WHERE...The Continental Divide along the Rocky Mountain Front, Upper Blackfoot and MacDonald Pass, Elkhorn and Boulder Mountains, and Northwest Beaverhead County. * WHEN...From Midnight tonight to 6 PM MDT Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be difficult.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or visiting the MDT Road Report website.

area.areaDesc: East Glacier Park Region; Elkhorn and Boulder Mountains; Northwest Beaverhead County; Southern Rocky Mountain Front; Upper Blackfoot and MacDonald Pass
